meanings.sent1: The doll with two heads was a strange sight.
meanings.sent2: The snake had a triangular head.
meanings.sent3: The two-headed monster in the movie made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The company's logo featured a lion headed statue.
meanings.sent5: The headed robot in the sci-fi book was incredibly lifelike.

meanings.definition: Moving or traveling in a specified direction.
meanings.sent1: The train was headed towards the city.
meanings.sent3: The car headed straight for the puddle, splashing water everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The arrow was headed directly at the target.
meanings.sent5: The rocket ship was headed for the stars, leaving Earth behind.

meanings.definition: Having a particular kind or number of heads.
meanings.sent2: The headed hammer had a flat surface for pounding nails.
meanings.sent3: The double-headed axe was a unique weapon in the game.
meanings.sent4: The headed statue had intricate carvings on each face.
meanings.sent5: The headed coin had the image of a famous leader on it.

meanings.sent1: The document with no headed section was confusing.
meanings.sent2: The report had a clear headed title at the top.
meanings.sent3: The book's headed chapters made it easy to navigate.
meanings.sent4: The email had a bold headed subject line.
meanings.sent5: The newspaper article had a large headed headline for breaking news.
